set.commands:
oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegimport libidn-1.28 # needs gettext (libintl) oegimport gettext-0.18.2.1 # needs libiconv oegimport libiconv-1.14 oegimport zlib-1.2.8 oegextract curl-7.31.0.tar.bz2
# no includes in CFLAGS! export CFLAGS="-m32 -march=i686 -mtune=i686 -pipe -O2 -mms-bitfields -fomit-frame-pointer" export CPPFLAGS="-m32 -march=i686 -mtune=i686 -pipe -O2 -mms-bitfields -fomit-frame-pointer -I/open-egovernment/include"
# disabled most options configure --prefix=/open-egovernment --without-ssl --without-gnutls --without-polarssl --without-cyassl --without-nss --without-axtls --without-ca-bundle --without-ca-path --without-libmetalink -without-libssh2 --without-librtmp --without-winidn -with-libidn=/open-egovernment --with-winssl --without-darwinssl --enable-ipv6 --with-zlib=/open-egovernment --enable-cookies --enable-sspi --enable-threaded-resolver --disable-tls-srp --enable-crypto-auth --enable-verbose --enable-manual --disable-gopher --enable-http --enable-ftp --enable-file --enable-rtsp --enable-proxy --enable-dict --enable-telnet --enable-tftp --enable-pop3 --enable-imap --enable-smtp --disable-ldap --disable-ldaps --disable-ares --disable-symbol-hiding
make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive curl-7.31.0
